content.text: Hi there! What do you do for work?
I work in a lab. I'm a scientist.
That sounds interesting! What kind of science?
I study plants. I'm trying to find ways to help them grow better.
That's cool! I like plants. I'm a vegetarian.
Oh, that's funny. I'm a vegan. I've been one since I was 5 years old.
Wow, that's young! What made you decide to become a vegan?
I was watching a documentary about factory farming, and I was really upset by what I saw. I decided that I couldn't be a part of that industry anymore.
I can understand that. I've seen some of those documentaries too, and they're really eye-opening.
Yeah, they are. They're hard to watch, but they're important.
I agree. I think it's important for people to know what happens to animals in factory farms.
I think so too. That's why I'm so passionate about veganism. I want to help people make the connection between their food choices and the animals that are harmed in the process.
I think you're doing great work. I'm really impressed by your dedication to this cause.
Thank you. I'm just glad that I can make a difference.
You're definitely making a difference. I'm sure you've inspired a lot of people to think about their food choices.
I hope so. That's what I'm hoping for.
Well, I'm glad I met you. You're an inspiration.
Thank you. It was nice meeting you too.
